currency.description: The currency used in amounts. Use the three-letter currency code from [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) eg: Use GBP for Pounds Sterling.
currency.title: Currency

transactionDate.description: When did this transaction take place? The date should be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format.
transactionDate.title: Transaction Date

value.description: The total value of this transaction.
value.title: Value

valueDate.description: The date that this value was set (to allow historical currency conversion). The date should be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format.
valueDate.title: Value Date

provider.description: The organisation identifier of the provider of transaction funds.
provider.title: Provider

recipient.description: The organisation identifier of the recipient of transaction funds.
recipient.title: Recipient

dateModified.description: When was information about this transaction last updated? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

documentType.description: A document category. For example, 'Application Form', 'Photo' or 'Project Report'. In future, 360Giving will provide a codelist of document types.
documentType.title: Document Type

dateModified.description: What was this information last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

countryCode.description: The 2-character ISO Country Code of the location of this activity. Taken from [ISO-3166-1-alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)
countryCode.title: Country Code

latitude.description: The latitude of a point location. Using [WGS 84](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System) standard, for example 51.501502
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: The longitude of a point location. Using [WGS 84](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System) standard, for example -0.175269
longitude.title: Longitude

description.description: A description of this location. This could include details of the element of the activity that takes place here.
description.title: Description

geoCode.description: A code referring to a geographical area, drawn from an established gazetteer such as the [ONS Register of Geographic Codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ONS_coding_system) in the UK. For example, the code for a local authority ward, or parliamentary constituency.
geoCode.title: Geographic Code

geoCodeType.description: The type of Geographic Code (geoCode) used (e.g. Ward, Parliamentary Constituency etc.). This value for this field should be drawn from the [codelist of geographic code types](https://github.com/ThreeSixtyGiving/standard/tree/master/codelists/geoCodeType.csv).
geoCodeType.title: Geographic Code Type

dateModified.description: When was this location information last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

vocabulary.description: A vocabulary used for this classification.
vocabulary.title: Vocabulary

code.description: A codelist value in the chosen vocabulary.
code.title: Code

url.description: A web link to more details of this classification.
url.title: URL

dateModified.description: When was this grant classification information last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

code.description: An identifier for this grant programme.
code.title: Code

title.description: The title of this grant programme.
title.title: Title

description.description: A description of this grant programme.
description.title: Description

url.description: A web link to more details of this grant programme.
url.title: URL

dateModified.description: When was the link between this grant and its grant programme last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

id.description: A unique identifier which identifies the person in the dataset
id.title: Identifier

name.description: The Person's full name or a generic name such as "Individual Recipient"
name.title: Name

id.description: A globally unique identifier for this organisation. This is important to enable data on funders and recipients to be linked up across different grant-makers. The [Organisation Identifier Standard](https://standard.threesixtygiving.org/en/latest/technical/identifiers/#organisation-identifier) guidance explains how to create this ID, based either on the known company or charity number, or upon identifiers held in the grantmaker's internal systems.
id.title: Identifier

department.description: The department or sub-unit of this organisation making or receiving the grant.
department.title: Department

contactName.description: The contact person at this organisation.
contactName.title: Contact Name

companyNumber.description: Registered UK company number, if applicable.
companyNumber.title: Company Number

streetAddress.description: Organisation address building number and street name.
streetAddress.title: Street Address

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this organisation (e.g. trading name)
alternateName.title: Alternate Name

email.description: The email address for this organisation.
email.title: Email

description.description: A short description of this organisation and its area of work
description.title: Description

url.description: A web address for the Organisation
url.title: Web Address

location.description: Information about the location of the organisation.
location.title: Location

dateModified.description: When was the organisation information for this grant last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

Event.title: Event
Event.description: An event in the life of the grant activity

startDate.description: All events should have a start date. Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
startDate.title: Start Date

endDate.description: An end date for the grant. Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
endDate.title: End Date

duration.description: The duration of the grant, in months. Must be in number format.
duration.title: Duration (months)

dateModified.description: When was information about this event last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

id.description: The unique identifier for this grant. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](https://standard.threesixtygiving.org/en/latest/technical/identifiers/#grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Identifier

title.description: A title for this grant activity. This should be under 140 characters long.
title.title: Title

description.description: A short description of this grant activity.
description.title: Description

amountAppliedFor.description: Total amount applied for in numbers (do not include commas or currency symbols such as £). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the application transactions for this grant.
amountAppliedFor.title: Amount Applied For

amountAwarded.description: Total amount awarded in numbers (do not include commas or currency symbols such as £). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the award transactions for this grant.
amountAwarded.title: Amount Awarded

amountDisbursed.description: Total amount disbursed (paid) to this grantee when this record was last updated (in numbers: do not include commas or currency symbols such as £)). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the disbursement transactions for this grant.
amountDisbursed.title: Amount Disbursed

awardDate.description: When the decision to award this grant was made. The date must be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format.
awardDate.title: Award Date

url.description: A URL (Web Address) where further information about this grant can be found. This could point to the website of the recipient organisation, or might link to further details on the funders website.
url.title: URL

plannedDates.title: Planned Dates
plannedDates.description: When the recipient organisation intends this activity to take place. A date range can include a start date and duration in months, or a start and end date.

actualDates.description: When did this grant activity actually take place. Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. A date range can include a start date and duration in months, or a start and end date.
actualDates.title: Actual Dates

recipientIndividual.title: Recipient Ind
recipientIndividual.description: Details of the recipient of this grant to an individual.

primaryGrantReason.title: Primary Grant Reason
primaryGrantReason.description: A code referring to the reason(s) for a grant to an individual. The value for this field should be drawn from the Grant to Individuals Reason codelist

secondaryGrantReason.title: Secondary Grant Reason
secondaryGrantReason.description: A code referring to the reason(s) for a grant to an individual. The value for this field should be drawn from the Grant to Individuals Reason codelist

grantPurpose.title: Grant Purpose
grantPurpose.description: A code referring to the purpose(s) for a grant to an individual. The value(s) for this field should be drawn from the Grant to Individuals Purpose codelist

recipientOrganization.title: Recipient Org
recipientOrganization.description: Details of the recipient of this grant.

beneficiaryLocation.title: Beneficiary Location
beneficiaryLocation.description: Information about the location of beneficiaries. Further information about beneficiaries can be provided through classifications.

grantProgramme.description: Information about the grant programme under which the grant was awarded
grantProgramme.title: Grant Programme

fromOpenCall.description: Was this grant made as the result of an open call for applications? Values must be 'Yes' or 'No'
fromOpenCall.title: From An Open Call?

fundingType.description: Information about the type of funding provided by the grant
fundingType.title: Funding Type

classifications.description: Information about a classification associated with the grant
classifications.title: Classifications

relatedDocument.description: Information about a document related to the grant
relatedDocument.title: Related Document

relatedActivity.description: The identifiers of any related activities (e.g. other grants given as part of a multi-grant project)
relatedActivity.title: Related Activity

dateModified.description: When was information on this grant last updated? A full date-time format must be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
dateModified.title: Last Modified

dataSource.description: A web link pointing to the source of this data. This may be an original 360Giving data file, a file from which the data was converted, or an organisation website.
dataSource.title: Data Source

regrantType.title: For Regrant Type
regrantType.description: A code referring to the type of regranting process that this grant represents. The value for this field should be drawn from the Regrant Type codelist

locationScope.title: Location Scope
locationScope.description: A code referring to the location scope applicable to this grant. The value for this field should be drawn from the Location Scope codelist.
